doc.name: GetCausalityInterface
doc.description: Actor that reads the causality interface of its container or an actor inside the container and produces a string describing it. This actor is meant mainly for testing.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: Output port on which to put the description of the dependent ports.
Output port on which to put the description of the equivalence classes.
doc.property: Name of the actor to get the causality interface of. If this is the empty string (the default), then the container is used.
